【C】If you have 2 or more other 《レヴュー》 Character, this card gets +1 Level and +1500 Power.
【A】When this card's battle opponent becomes REVERSE, choose 1 of your other 《レヴュー》 Character, REST it, move it to an empty slot at Back Row.

【A】 This Ability can be activated up to 1 time each turn. When you use 【S】, choose 1 of your Character, during this turn, it gets ＋500 Power.
【S】CONCENTRATION ［(1) REST this card］ Flip the top 4 cards of your Deck, place them into Waiting Room. For each Climax among those cards, choose up to 1 Character from your Waiting Room, return it to Hand.

【A】This Ability can be activated up to 1 time each turn. When you use 【S】, during this turn, this card gets +1500 Power.
【A】【CXCOMBO】When this card attacks, if 「新シンデレラは正義の味方！」 is in your Climax Slot, and your Hand has 6 or less cards, look at up to 3 cards from your top Deck, choose up to 1 《レヴュー》 Character and show it to opponent, add it to Hand, place the remaining cards into Waiting Room.

【A】When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, you draw up to 2 cards, choose 2 cards from your Hand, place them into Waiting Room, place up to 1 card from your top Deck into Stock.
【A】This Ability can be activated up to 1 time each turn. When you use 【S】, during this turn, this card gets +X Power. X is equal to the number of your other 《レヴュー》 Character x500.

【A】At the beginning of opponent's Attack Phase, you may place the top card of your Deck into Waiting Room. If that card is a 《レヴュー》 Character, you may move this card to an empty slot at Front Row.

【A】[(1)] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you did, during this attack, perform Trigger Check 2 times during Trigger Step.

【A】This Ability can be activated up to 1 time each turn. 【A】ENCORE ［Place 1 Character from Hand into Waiting Room］ (When this card is placed into Waiting Room from Stage, you may pay this Cost. If you do, place this card in its previous slot in REST)
